## IConfigFile.apiReport property

Configures how the API report files (\*.api.md) will be generated.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
apiReport?: IConfigApiReport;
```

## Remarks

This is part of the [IConfigFile](./api-extractor.iconfigfile.md) structure.
